title: How to Make a Paper Boat with a Big Sail

steps.title: Perfect your technique for making a regular paper boat first.
steps.content: Perfect your technique for making a regular paper boat first.

steps.title: Use one of the paper sheets to make the normal boat, then go to Step 3 to make the Big Sail.
steps.content: Use one of the paper sheets to make the normal boat, then go to Step 3 to make the Big Sail.

steps.title: Use the other sheet of paper to make the Big Sail.
steps.content: Use the other sheet of paper to make the Big Sail.

steps.title: Take the top-left corner of the paper and fold it down to the exact bottom point
steps.content: Take the top-left corner of the paper and fold it down to the exact bottom point

steps.title: Then fold the top-right corner to the exact previous fold point, then do the same with the bottom-right corner.
steps.content: Then fold the top-right corner to the exact previous fold point, then do the same with the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Fold the right side to the fold point you made at Step 4.
steps.content: Fold the right side to the fold point you made at Step 4.

steps.title: Turn the sheet to a right-side-up triangle.
steps.content: Turn the sheet to a right-side-up triangle.

steps.title: Apply glue to the left side and stick it to the right side.
steps.content: Apply glue to the left side and stick it to the right side.

steps.title: Then fold that in half with the triangle right side up.
steps.content: Then fold that in half with the triangle right side up.

steps.title: Open the fold you just made and then apply glue to one side and stick it to the other side.
steps.content: Open the fold you just made and then apply glue to one side and stick it to the other side.

steps.title: Turn the triangle to the side where it is not right side up, and it's not a closed fold at the bottom.
steps.content: Turn the triangle to the side where it is not right side up, and it's not a closed fold at the bottom.

steps.title: Put that over the sail in the centre of the normal boat and there you have it!
steps.content: Put that over the sail in the centre of the normal boat and there you have it! A Paper Boat with a Big Sail!
